sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Layout class="main_layout">
        <Header class="main_header">新闻响应速度可视化平台</Header>
        <Content class="main_content">
            
            
            
        </Content>
        <Footer class="main_footer">
            <TimeList/>
        </Footer>
    </Layout>
</template>
<script>
import TimeList from './main_time.vue'
export default {
    components:{
        TimeList
    }
}
</script>
<style lang="less" scoped>
.main_layout{
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);
    .main_header{
        //margin-left: 518px;
        margin-top: 65px;
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 100);
        font-size: 55px;
        text-align: center;
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);
        font-family: SourceHanSansSC-bold;
    }
    .main_content{
        margin-top: 33px;
        width: 100%;
        height: 640px;
        opacity: 0.87;
        background: url(../assets/view_test.PNG) no-repeat fixed;
        background-size: 100% 100%;
        background-size: cover;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-attachment: fixed;  /*关键*/
        background-position: center;

        
    }
    .main_footer{
        height: 100%;
        padding-top: 200px;
        padding-left: 150px;
    }
} 


</style>
